summary: Adds more vibrant and fantasy-like textures to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img846/5815/00banner.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=8]Natural Fantasy - A New Retexture Mod For ENB and Vanilla[/b][/size]

Thank you for taking a look at my fantasy texture mod! 

I designed the textures in this mod to reflect actual textures from where I live.  I have taken pictures of natural tree bark, natural moss covered rocks, and natural grass and dirt from my yard, and converted them into textures.  For instance...where I live, we have naturally red clay, which I think is absolutely beautiful, so I have converted some pictures of it as well.  
And the field grass was completely hand drawn in Photoshop.

These textures are 2x the original Skyrim vanilla version.

[b][size=5]EDIT: I made a default, vanilla size 1k version, and it looks really good if you are looking for a performance friendly version!![/b][/size]

[b][size=8]Recommended Mods[/b][/size]
[i]Not required, but some are highly recommended[/i]

The main mod that I use to make the grass denser is [b]\"Lush Grass,\"[/b] which you can download here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288[/url]

Also, I highly recommend [b]\"Wintertide - Fantasy ENB,\"[/b] as it makes just about anything look vibrant and beautiful...and just downright amazing!  And here is a link:  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28176]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28176[/url]

And if you haven\'t downloaded, [b]\"Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting,\"[/b] you really need to!!   Link is here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802[/url]

----

Now, those are just the recommended ones.  If you want an even greater amount of density in your grass, you can also try the mod, [b]\"Grass and Grass\"[/b]  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21525]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21525[/url]  

Also, you can put this in your Skyrim.ini settings, under \"grass\"
iMinGrassSize=4

But I warn you, you must have a really high performance computer to render so much grass!
Also, if you are on a low end pc, you also might take a small performance hit just from these textures.  So I can say that at least I warned you.  ;)  


[b][size=8]Video For Natural Fantasy[/b][/size]

[i]Using the lowest quality texture package at vanilla settings, just to show the beauty!  :D[/i]

[youtube]1iULSuUeAZk[/youtube]

So, I hope you all enjoy another silly texture mod from me!  I\'ll be back soon to try my hand at retexturing my favorite armors from the Dragonborn DLC.  Until then!
author: Stephanie Young
